snippet: News of his death triggered large gatherings in several cities, including Istanbul, Izmir and Ankara, where the police confronted protesters with tear gas and water cannons.
abstract: Thousands of people take to streets in Istanbul to protest death of Berkin Elvan, 15-year-old boy who became symbol of civilian resistance after being struck in head by tear-gas canister fired by police during antigovernment demonstrations.
lead_paragraph: News of his death triggered large gatherings in several cities, including Istanbul, Izmir and Ankara, where the police confronted protesters with tear gas and water cannons.

headline.main: Death of Boy Caught in Melee Spurs Protests Across Turkey
headline.print_headline: Death of Boy Caught in Melee Spurs Protests Across Turkey
